ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: They should try (damn hard) to first make the (new) songs - valuable for the given level that they are earned - in light of how we now know the game gets
ygData.messageBody:
They should try (damn hard) to first make the (new) songs - valuable for the
given level that they are earned - in light of how we now know the game gets
played vs how they thought the game would get played ("it will take the
average player 12 months to reach level 50..." put that right next to
"...no one will ever need more than 256k memory let alone 640k...")

I agree that a true "invis-to-Lower-Guk-undead-mobs-except-the-GIBS" would
be entirely apprapo for 39 if not a tad late but about right.

Hmm, a target only, single pulse song that casts a symbol buff or rune? It
could easily use the same reagent as the cleric/pallidan/enchanter, etc.
spells. Might be real good idea. And 45 might be a good level to get it -
you can easily afford the reagents and could use some self buffs for soloing
HG/SG/Spec's to get thru 45 Hell(tm).

And how about something that helps in the alter-planes for 49?

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 12:16 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Missing Songs!!


> From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
> This makes all the more likely we won't get this ability, since nothing
> we do has a component...
>
> kim@... wrote:
> >
> > From: <kim@...>
> >
> > On Tue, 15 Feb 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
> > >
> > > > Level 47: Summon Corpse song (like the necro one)
